title: Definition and basic properties of monoids
content: According to Wikipedia ("Monoid", ~ https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Monoid , 6-Feb-2020,) "In abstract algebra [[...] a _monoid_ is an algebraic structure with a single associative binary operation and an identity element. Monoids are semigroups with identity.". In the following, monoids are defined in the second way (as semigroups with identity), see ~ df-mnd , whereas many authors define magmas in the first way (as algebraic structure with a single associative binary operation and an identity element, i.e. without the need of a definition for/knowledge about semigroups), see ~ ismnd . See, for example, the definition in [Lang] p. 3: "A _monoid_ is a set G, with a law of composition which is associative, and having a unit element".

blocks.name: cmnd
blocks.content: Extend class notation with class of all monoids.
blocks.origin: const class cmnd { Mnd }

diff.cmnd.c
diff.cmnd.w
df-mnd
blocks.content: A _monoid_ is a semigroup, which has a two-sided neutral element. Definition 2 in [BourbakiAlg1] p. 12. In other words (according to the definition in [Lang] p. 3), a monoid is a set equipped with an everywhere defined internal operation (see ~ mndcl ), whose operation is associative (see ~ mndass ) and has a two-sided neutral element (see ~ mndid ), see also ~ ismnd . (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 6-Jan-2015.) (Revised by AV, 1-Feb-2020.)
blocks.origin:
axiom df-mnd(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, setvar s4) {
  |- wceq(cmnd, crab(s0, csgrp, wsbc(s1, cfv(cbs, cv(s0)), wsbc(s2, cfv(cplusg, cv(s0)), wrex(s3, cv(s1), wral(s4, cv(s1), wa(wceq(co(cv(s3), cv(s2), cv(s4)), cv(s4)), wceq(co(cv(s4), cv(s2), cv(s3)), cv(s4)))))))))
  -| diffss(s1, s3)
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s4)
  -| diffss(s0, s3)
  -| diffss(s2, s3)
  -| diffss(s3, s4)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s0, s4)
  -| diffss(s2, s4)
}
blocks.pretty:
axiom df-mnd(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, setvar s4) {
  ⊢ Mnd = { s0 ∈ SGrp |[(Base ` s0)/ s1][(+ ` s0)/ s2]∃(s3 ∈ s1, ∀(s4 ∈ s1,((s3[s2]s4)= s4 ∧(s4[s2]s3)= s4)))}
  ⊣ d(s1, s3)
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s1, s2)
  ⊣ d(s1, s4)
  ⊣ d(s0, s3)
  ⊣ d(s2, s3)
  ⊣ d(s3, s4)
  ⊣ d(s0, s2)
  ⊣ d(s0, s4)
  ⊣ d(s2, s4)
}

thm ismnddef(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wb(wcel(c0, cmnd), wa(wcel(c0, csgrp), wrex(s0, c1, wral(s1, c1, wa(wceq(co(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1)), cv(s1)), wceq(co(cv(s1), c2, cv(s0)), cv(s1)))))))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(cbs, c0))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cplusg, c0))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
} = {
  elrab2(hs2, c0, cmnd, csgrp, wrex(s0, c1, wral(s1, c1, wa(wceq(co(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1)), cv(s1)), wceq(co(cv(s1), c2, cv(s0)), cv(s1))))), wsbc(hs1, cfv(cbs, cv(hs2)), wsbc(hs0, cfv(cplusg, cv(hs2)), wrex(s0, cv(hs1), wral(s1, cv(hs1), wa(wceq(co(cv(s0), cv(hs0), cv(s1)), cv(s1)), wceq(co(cv(s1), cv(hs0), cv(s0)), cv(s1))))))))
  sbc2iedv(hs1, hs0, cfv(cbs, cv(hs2)), cfv(cplusg, cv(hs2)), wceq(cv(hs2), c0), wrex(s0, cv(hs1), wral(s1, cv(hs1), wa(wceq(co(cv(s0), cv(hs0), cv(s1)), cv(s1)), wceq(co(cv(s1), cv(hs0), cv(s0)), cv(s1))))), wrex(s0, c1, wral(s1, c1, wa(wceq(co(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1)), cv(s1)), wceq(co(cv(s1), c2, cv(s0)), cv(s1))))))
  fvex(cbs, cv(hs2))
  fvex(cplusg, cv(hs2))
  syl6bi(wceq(cv(hs2), c0), wa(wceq(cv(hs1), cfv(cbs, cv(hs2))), wceq(cv(hs0), cfv(cplusg, cv(hs2)))), wb(wrex(s0, cv(hs1), wral(s1, cv(hs1), wa(wceq(co(cv(s0), cv(hs0), cv(s1)), cv(s1)), wceq(co(cv(s1), cv(hs0), cv(s0)), cv(s1))))), wrex(s0, c1, wral(s1, c1, wa(wceq(co(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1)), cv(s1)), wceq(co(cv(s1), c2, cv(s0)), cv(s1)))))), wa(wceq(cv(hs1), c1), wceq(cv(hs0), c2)))
  anbi12d(wceq(cv(hs2), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), cfv(cbs, cv(hs2))), wceq(cv(hs0), cfv(cplusg, cv(hs2))), wceq(cv(hs1), c1), wceq(cv(hs0), c2))
  eqeq2d(cv(hs1), cfv(cbs, cv(hs2)), c1, wceq(cv(hs2), c0))
  syl6eqr(cfv(cbs, cv(hs2)), c1, cfv(cbs, c0), wceq(cv(hs2), c0))
  fveq2(cv(hs2), c0, cbs)
  eqeq2d(cv(hs0), cfv(cplusg, cv(hs2)), c2, wceq(cv(hs2), c0))
  syl6eqr(cfv(cplusg, cv(hs2)), c2, cfv(cplusg, c0), wceq(cv(hs2), c0))
  fveq2(cv(hs2), c0, cplusg)
  rexeqbidv(s0, cv(hs1), c1, wa(wceq(cv(hs1), c1), wceq(cv(hs0), c2)), wral(s1, cv(hs1), wa(wceq(co(cv(s0), cv(hs0), cv(s1)), cv(s1)), wceq(co(cv(s1), cv(hs0), cv(s0)), cv(s1)))), wral(s1, c1, wa(wceq(co(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1)), cv(s1)), wceq(co(cv(s1), c2, cv(s0)), cv(s1)))))
  raleqbidv(s1, cv(hs1), c1, wa(wceq(cv(hs1), c1), wceq(cv(hs0), c2)), wa(wceq(co(cv(s0), cv(hs0), cv(s1)), cv(s1)), wceq(co(cv(s1), cv(hs0), cv(s0)), cv(s1))), wa(wceq(co(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1)), cv(s1)), wceq(co(cv(s1), c2, cv(s0)), cv(s1))))
  simpl(wceq(cv(hs1), c1), wceq(cv(hs0), c2))
  adantl(wceq(cv(hs1), c1), wceq(cv(hs0), c2), wb(wa(wceq(co(cv(s0), cv(hs0), cv(s1)), cv(s1)), wceq(co(cv(s1), cv(hs0), cv(s0)), cv(s1))), wa(wceq(co(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1)), cv(s1)), wceq(co(cv(s1), c2, cv(s0)), cv(s1)))))
  anbi12d(wceq(cv(hs0), c2), wceq(co(cv(s0), cv(hs0), cv(s1)), cv(s1)), wceq(co(cv(s1), cv(hs0), cv(s0)), cv(s1)), wceq(co(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1)), cv(s1)), wceq(co(cv(s1), c2, cv(s0)), cv(s1)))
  eqeq1d(co(cv(s0), cv(hs0), cv(s1)), cv(s1), co(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1)), wceq(cv(hs0), c2))
  oveq(cv(hs0), c2, cv(s0), cv(s1))
  eqeq1d(co(cv(s1), cv(hs0), cv(s0)), cv(s1), co(cv(s1), c2, cv(s0)), wceq(cv(hs0), c2))
  oveq(cv(hs0), c2, cv(s1), cv(s0))
  df-mnd(hs2, hs1, hs0, s0, s1)
  diff.hs2.c(c0)
  diff.hs2.c(csgrp)
  diff.hs2.w(wrex(s0, c1, wral(s1, c1, wa(wceq(co(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1)), cv(s1)), wceq(co(cv(s1), c2, cv(s0)), cv(s1))))))
  diff.hs1.s(hs0)
  diff.hs1.c(cfv(cbs, cv(hs2)))
  diff.hs0.c(cfv(cbs, cv(hs2)))
  diff.hs0.c(cfv(cplusg, cv(hs2)))
  diff.hs1.w(wceq(cv(hs2), c0))
  diff.hs1.w(wrex(s0, c1, wral(s1, c1, wa(wceq(co(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1)), cv(s1)), wceq(co(cv(s1), c2, cv(s0)), cv(s1))))))
  diff.hs0.w(wceq(cv(hs2), c0))
  diff.hs0.w(wrex(s0, c1, wral(s1, c1, wa(wceq(co(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1)), cv(s1)), wceq(co(cv(s1), c2, cv(s0)), cv(s1))))))
  diff.wa.s(s0, wceq(cv(hs1), c1), wceq(cv(hs0), c2))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cv(hs1), c1)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs1)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs1)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cv(hs0), c2)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.wa.s(s1, wceq(cv(hs1), c1), wceq(cv(hs0), c2))
  diff.wceq.s(s1, cv(hs1), c1)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs1)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs1)
  diff.wceq.s(s1, cv(hs0), c2)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs1.s(s0)
  diff.hs2.s(hs1)
  diff.hs1.s(s1)
  diff.hs2.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs2.s(hs0)
  diff.hs2.s(s1)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm ismnddef(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ⊢ (c0 ∈ Mnd ↔(c0 ∈ SGrp ∧ ∃(s0 ∈ c1, ∀(s1 ∈ c1,((s0[c2]s1)= s1 ∧(s1[c2]s0)= s1)))))
  ⊣ c1 =(Base ` c0)
  ⊣ c2 =(+ ` c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
  ⊣ d(s1, c1)
  ⊣ d(s1, c2)
} = {
  elrab2(hs2, c0, cmnd, csgrp, ∃(s0 ∈ c1, ∀(s1 ∈ c1,((s0[c2]s1)= s1 ∧(s1[c2]s0)= s1))), [(Base ` hs2)/ hs1][(+ ` hs2)/ hs0]∃(s0 ∈ hs1, ∀(s1 ∈ hs1,((s0[hs0]s1)= s1 ∧(s1[hs0]s0)= s1))))
  sbc2iedv(hs1, hs0, (Base ` hs2), (+ ` hs2), hs2 = c0, ∃(s0 ∈ hs1, ∀(s1 ∈ hs1,((s0[hs0]s1)= s1 ∧(s1[hs0]s0)= s1))), ∃(s0 ∈ c1, ∀(s1 ∈ c1,((s0[c2]s1)= s1 ∧(s1[c2]s0)= s1))))
  fvex(cbs, hs2)
  fvex(cplusg, hs2)
  syl6bi(hs2 = c0, (hs1 =(Base ` hs2)∧ hs0 =(+ ` hs2)), (∃(s0 ∈ hs1, ∀(s1 ∈ hs1,((s0[hs0]s1)= s1 ∧(s1[hs0]s0)= s1)))↔ ∃(s0 ∈ c1, ∀(s1 ∈ c1,((s0[c2]s1)= s1 ∧(s1[c2]s0)= s1)))), (hs1 = c1 ∧ hs0 = c2))
  anbi12d(hs2 = c0, hs1 =(Base ` hs2), hs0 =(+ ` hs2), hs1 = c1, hs0 = c2)
  eqeq2d(hs1, (Base ` hs2), c1, hs2 = c0)
  syl6eqr((Base ` hs2), c1, (Base ` c0), hs2 = c0)
  fveq2(hs2, c0, cbs)
  eqeq2d(hs0, (+ ` hs2), c2, hs2 = c0)
  syl6eqr((+ ` hs2), c2, (+ ` c0), hs2 = c0)
  fveq2(hs2, c0, cplusg)
  rexeqbidv(s0, hs1, c1, (hs1 = c1 ∧ hs0 = c2), ∀(s1 ∈ hs1,((s0[hs0]s1)= s1 ∧(s1[hs0]s0)= s1)), ∀(s1 ∈ c1,((s0[c2]s1)= s1 ∧(s1[c2]s0)= s1)))
  raleqbidv(s1, hs1, c1, (hs1 = c1 ∧ hs0 = c2), ((s0[hs0]s1)= s1 ∧(s1[hs0]s0)= s1), ((s0[c2]s1)= s1 ∧(s1[c2]s0)= s1))
  simpl(hs1 = c1, hs0 = c2)
  adantl(hs1 = c1, hs0 = c2, (((s0[hs0]s1)= s1 ∧(s1[hs0]s0)= s1)↔((s0[c2]s1)= s1 ∧(s1[c2]s0)= s1)))
  anbi12d(hs0 = c2, (s0[hs0]s1)= s1, (s1[hs0]s0)= s1, (s0[c2]s1)= s1, (s1[c2]s0)= s1)
  eqeq1d((s0[hs0]s1), s1, (s0[c2]s1), hs0 = c2)
  oveq(hs0, c2, s0, s1)
  eqeq1d((s1[hs0]s0), s1, (s1[c2]s0), hs0 = c2)
  oveq(hs0, c2, s1, s0)
  df-mnd(hs2, hs1, hs0, s0, s1)
  diff.hs2.c(c0)
  diff.hs2.c(csgrp)
  diff.hs2.w(∃(s0 ∈ c1, ∀(s1 ∈ c1,((s0[c2]s1)= s1 ∧(s1[c2]s0)= s1))))
  diff.hs1.s(hs0)
  diff.hs1.c((Base ` hs2))
  diff.hs0.c((Base ` hs2))
  diff.hs0.c((+ ` hs2))
  diff.hs1.w(hs2 = c0)
  diff.hs1.w(∃(s0 ∈ c1, ∀(s1 ∈ c1,((s0[c2]s1)= s1 ∧(s1[c2]s0)= s1))))
  diff.hs0.w(hs2 = c0)
  diff.hs0.w(∃(s0 ∈ c1, ∀(s1 ∈ c1,((s0[c2]s1)= s1 ∧(s1[c2]s0)= s1))))
  diff.wa.s(s0, hs1 = c1, hs0 = c2)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, hs1, c1)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs1)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs1)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, hs0, c2)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.wa.s(s1, hs1 = c1, hs0 = c2)
  diff.wceq.s(s1, hs1, c1)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs1)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs1)
  diff.wceq.s(s1, hs0, c2)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs1.s(s0)
  diff.hs2.s(hs1)
  diff.hs1.s(s1)
  diff.hs2.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs2.s(hs0)
  diff.hs2.s(s1)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
}

blocks.name: ismnd
blocks.content: The predicate "is a monoid". This is the definig theorem of a monoid by showing that a set is a monoid if and only if it is a set equipped with a closed, everywhere defined internal operation (so, a magma, see ~ mndcl ), whose operation is associative (so, a semigroup, see also ~ mndass ) and has a two-sided neutral element (see ~ mndid ). (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 6-Jan-2015.) (Revised by AV, 1-Feb-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm ismnd(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wb(wcel(c0, cmnd), wa(wral(s0, c1, wral(s1, c1, wa(wcel(co(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1)), c1), wral(s2, c1, wceq(co(co(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1)), c2, cv(s2)), co(cv(s0), c2, co(cv(s1), c2, cv(s2)))))))), wrex(s3, c1, wral(s0, c1, wa(wceq(co(cv(s3), c2, cv(s0)), cv(s0)), wceq(co(cv(s0), c2, cv(s3)), cv(s0)))))))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(cbs, c0))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cplusg, c0))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s0, s3)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c1)
  -| diffsc(s2, c2)
  -| diffsc(s3, c1)
  -| diffsc(s3, c2)
} = {
  bitri(wcel(c0, cmnd), wa(wral(s0, c1, wral(s1, c1, wa(wcel(co(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1)), c1), wral(s2, c1, wceq(co(co(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1)), c2, cv(s2)), co(cv(s0), c2, co(cv(s1), c2, cv(s2)))))))), wrex(s3, c1, wral(s0, c1, wa(wceq(co(cv(s3), c2, cv(s0)), cv(s0)), wceq(co(cv(s0), c2, cv(s3)), cv(s0)))))), wa(wcel(c0, csgrp), wrex(s3, c1, wral(s0, c1, wa(wceq(co(cv(s3), c2, cv(s0)), cv(s0)), wceq(co(cv(s0), c2, cv(s3)), cv(s0)))))))
  ismnddef(s3, s0, c0, c1, c2)
  pm5.32ri(wcel(c0, csgrp), wrex(s3, c1, wral(s0, c1, wa(wceq(co(cv(s3), c2, cv(s0)), cv(s0)), wceq(co(cv(s0), c2, cv(s3)), cv(s0))))), wral(s0, c1, wral(s1, c1, wa(wcel(co(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1)), c1), wral(s2, c1, wceq(co(co(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1)), c2, cv(s2)), co(cv(s0), c2, co(cv(s1), c2, cv(s2)))))))))
  3syl(wrex(s3, c1, wral(s0, c1, wa(wceq(co(cv(s3), c2, cv(s0)), cv(s0)), wceq(co(cv(s0), c2, cv(s3)), cv(s0))))), wb(wcel(c0, csgrp), wral(s0, c1, wral(s1, c1, wa(wcel(co(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1)), c1), wral(s2, c1, wceq(co(co(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1)), c2, cv(s2)), co(cv(s0), c2, co(cv(s1), c2, cv(s2))))))))), wne(c1, emptycls), wcel(c0, universe))
  rexn0(s3, c1, wral(s0, c1, wa(wceq(co(cv(s3), c2, cv(s0)), cv(s0)), wceq(co(cv(s0), c2, cv(s3)), cv(s0)))))
  necon1ai(c1, emptycls, wcel(c0, universe))
  syl5eq(c1, emptycls, cfv(cbs, c0), wn(wcel(c0, universe)))
  fvprc(c0, cbs)
  issgrpv(s0, s1, s2, c0, universe, c1, c2)
  diffss.ex(s3, s0)
}

blocks.name: isnmnd
blocks.content: A condition for a structure not to be a monoid: every element of the base set is not a left identity for at least one element of the base set. (Contributed by AV, 4-Feb-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm isnmnd(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wral(s0, c0, wrex(s1, c0, wne(co(cv(s0), c1, cv(s1)), cv(s1)))), wnel(c2, cmnd))
  -| wceq(c0, cfv(cbs, c2))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(cplusg, c2))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
} = {
  a1ii(wi(wral(s0, c0, wrex(s1, c0, wne(co(cv(s0), c1, cv(s1)), cv(s1)))), wnel(c2, cmnd)), diffsc(s0, c2))
  a1ii(wi(wral(s0, c0, wrex(s1, c0, wne(co(cv(s0), c1, cv(s1)), cv(s1)))), wnel(c2, cmnd)), diffsc(s1, c2))
  sylibr(wral(s0, c0, wrex(s1, c0, wne(co(cv(s0), c1, cv(s1)), cv(s1)))), wnel(c2, cmnd), wn(wcel(c2, cmnd)))
  sylnibr(wral(s0, c0, wrex(s1, c0, wne(co(cv(s0), c1, cv(s1)), cv(s1)))), wcel(c2, cmnd), wa(wcel(c2, csgrp), wrex(s0, c0, wral(s1, c0, wa(wceq(co(cv(s0), c1, cv(s1)), cv(s1)), wceq(co(cv(s1), c1, cv(s0)), cv(s1)))))))
  intnand(wral(s0, c0, wrex(s1, c0, wne(co(cv(s0), c1, cv(s1)), cv(s1)))), wcel(c2, csgrp), wrex(s0, c0, wral(s1, c0, wa(wceq(co(cv(s0), c1, cv(s1)), cv(s1)), wceq(co(cv(s1), c1, cv(s0)), cv(s1))))))
  sylib(wral(s0, c0, wrex(s1, c0, wne(co(cv(s0), c1, cv(s1)), cv(s1)))), wn(wrex(s0, c0, wral(s1, c0, wa(wceq(co(cv(s0), c1, cv(s1)), cv(s1)), wceq(co(cv(s1), c1, cv(s0)), cv(s1)))))), wral(s0, c0, wrex(s1, c0, wn(wa(wceq(co(cv(s0), c1, cv(s1)), cv(s1)), wceq(co(cv(s1), c1, cv(s0)), cv(s1)))))))
  ralimi(s0, c0, wrex(s1, c0, wne(co(cv(s0), c1, cv(s1)), cv(s1))), wrex(s1, c0, wn(wa(wceq(co(cv(s0), c1, cv(s1)), cv(s1)), wceq(co(cv(s1), c1, cv(s0)), cv(s1))))))
  reximi(s1, c0, wne(co(cv(s0), c1, cv(s1)), cv(s1)), wn(wa(wceq(co(cv(s0), c1, cv(s1)), cv(s1)), wceq(co(cv(s1), c1, cv(s0)), cv(s1)))))
  intnanrd(wne(co(cv(s0), c1, cv(s1)), cv(s1)), wceq(co(cv(s0), c1, cv(s1)), cv(s1)), wceq(co(cv(s1), c1, cv(s0)), cv(s1)))
  neneq(co(cv(s0), c1, cv(s1)), cv(s1))

  ralbii(s0, c0, wrex(s1, c0, wn(wa(wceq(co(cv(s0), c1, cv(s1)), cv(s1)), wceq(co(cv(s1), c1, cv(s0)), cv(s1))))), wn(wral(s1, c0, wa(wceq(co(cv(s0), c1, cv(s1)), cv(s1)), wceq(co(cv(s1), c1, cv(s0)), cv(s1))))))

blocks.name: mndid
blocks.content: A monoid has a two-sided identity element. (Contributed by NM, 16-Aug-2011.)
blocks.origin:
thm mndid(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cmnd), wrex(s0, c1, wral(s1, c1, wa(wceq(co(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1)), cv(s1)), wceq(co(cv(s1), c2, cv(s0)), cv(s1))))))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(cbs, c0))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cplusg, c0))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
} = {
  a1ii(wi(wcel(c0, cmnd), wrex(s0, c1, wral(s1, c1, wa(wceq(co(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1)), cv(s1)), wceq(co(cv(s1), c2, cv(s0)), cv(s1)))))), diffsc(s0, c0))
  simprbi(wcel(c0, cmnd), wrex(s0, c1, wral(s1, c1, wa(wceq(co(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1)), cv(s1)), wceq(co(cv(s1), c2, cv(s0)), cv(s1))))), wral(s1, c1, wral(hs0, c1, wa(wcel(co(cv(s1), c2, cv(hs0)), c1), wral(hs1, c1, wceq(co(co(cv(s1), c2, cv(hs0)), c2, cv(hs1)), co(cv(s1), c2, co(cv(hs0), c2, cv(hs1)))))))))
  ismnd(s1, hs0, hs1, s0, c0, c1, c2)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs1)
  diff.hs1.s(s1)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm mndid(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ⊢ (c0 ∈ Mnd → ∃(s0 ∈ c1, ∀(s1 ∈ c1,((s0[c2]s1)= s1 ∧(s1[c2]s0)= s1))))
  ⊣ c1 =(Base ` c0)
  ⊣ c2 =(+ ` c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c1)
  ⊣ d(s1, c2)
} = {
  a1ii((c0 ∈ Mnd → ∃(s0 ∈ c1, ∀(s1 ∈ c1,((s0[c2]s1)= s1 ∧(s1[c2]s0)= s1)))), d(s0, c0))
  simprbi(c0 ∈ Mnd, ∃(s0 ∈ c1, ∀(s1 ∈ c1,((s0[c2]s1)= s1 ∧(s1[c2]s0)= s1))), ∀(s1 ∈ c1, ∀(hs0 ∈ c1,((s1[c2]hs0)∈ c1 ∧ ∀(hs1 ∈ c1,((s1[c2]hs0)[c2]hs1)=(s1[c2](hs0[c2]hs1)))))))
  ismnd(s1, hs0, hs1, s0, c0, c1, c2)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs1)
  diff.hs1.s(s1)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
}

blocks.name: mndideu
blocks.content: The two-sided identity element of a monoid is unique. Lemma 2.2.1(a) of [Herstein] p. 55. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 8-Dec-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm mndideu(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2) {

  -| wceq(c1, cfv(cbs, c0))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cplusg, c0))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
} = {
  sylanblrc(wcel(c0, cmnd), wreu(s0, c1, wral(s1, c1, wa(wceq(co(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1)), cv(s1)), wceq(co(cv(s1), c2, cv(s0)), cv(s1))))), wrex(s0, c1, wral(s1, c1, wa(wceq(co(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1)), cv(s1)), wceq(co(cv(s1), c2, cv(s0)), cv(s1))))), wrmo(s0, c1, wral(s1, c1, wa(wceq(co(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1)), cv(s1)), wceq(co(cv(s1), c2, cv(s0)), cv(s1))))))
  mndid(s0, s1, c0, c1, c2)
  mgmidmo(s0, s1, c1, c2)
  reu5(s0, c1, wral(s1, c1, wa(wceq(co(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1)), cv(s1)), wceq(co(cv(s1), c2, cv(s0)), cv(s1)))))
}

blocks.origin:
thm mnd32g(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(co(co(c0, c1, c2), c1, c3), co(co(c0, c1, c3), c1, c2)))

  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, c4))

} = {
  3eqtr4d(co(co(c0, c1, c2), c1, c3), co(co(c0, c1, c3), c1, c2), co(c0, c1, co(c2, c1, c3)), co(c0, c1, co(c3, c1, c2)), w0)

  syl13anc(w0, wceq(co(co(c0, c1, c2), c1, c3), co(c0, c1, co(c2, c1, c3))), wcel(c5, cmnd), wcel(c0, c4), wcel(c2, c4), wcel(c3, c4))
  mndass(c5, c0, c4, c2, c3, c1)
  syl13anc(w0, wceq(co(co(c0, c1, c3), c1, c2), co(c0, c1, co(c3, c1, c2))), wcel(c5, cmnd), wcel(c0, c4), wcel(c3, c4), wcel(c2, c4))

blocks.name: mnd12g
blocks.content: Commutative/associative law for monoids, with an explicit commutativity hypothesis. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 21-Apr-2016.)
blocks.origin:
thm mnd12g(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(co(c0, c1, co(c2, c1, c3)), co(c2, c1, co(c0, c1, c3))))

} = {

blocks.name: mnd4g
blocks.content: Commutative/associative law for commutative monoids, with an explicit commutativity hypothesis. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 21-Apr-2016.)
blocks.origin:
thm mnd4g(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(co(co(c0, c1, c2), c1, co(c3, c1, c4)), co(co(c0, c1, c3), c1, co(c2, c1, c4))))
  -| wceq(c5, cfv(cbs, c6))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(cplusg, c6))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c6, cmnd))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c5))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, c5))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, c5))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c4, c5))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(co(c2, c1, c3), co(c3, c1, c2)))
} = {
  3eqtr4d(co(co(c0, c1, c2), c1, co(c3, c1, c4)), co(co(c0, c1, c3), c1, co(c2, c1, c4)), co(c0, c1, co(c2, c1, co(c3, c1, c4))), co(c0, c1, co(c3, c1, co(c2, c1, c4))), w0)
  oveq2d(c0, c1, co(c2, c1, co(c3, c1, c4)), co(c3, c1, co(c2, c1, c4)), w0)
  mnd12g(c2, c1, c3, c4, c5, c6, w0)
  syl13anc(w0, wceq(co(co(c0, c1, c2), c1, co(c3, c1, c4)), co(c0, c1, co(c2, c1, co(c3, c1, c4)))), wcel(c6, cmnd), wcel(c0, c5), wcel(c2, c5), wcel(co(c3, c1, c4), c5))
  syl3anc(w0, wcel(co(c3, c1, c4), c5), wcel(c6, cmnd), wcel(c3, c5), wcel(c4, c5))
  mndcl(c6, c3, c5, c4, c1)
  mndass(c6, c0, c5, c2, co(c3, c1, c4), c1)
  syl13anc(w0, wceq(co(co(c0, c1, c3), c1, co(c2, c1, c4)), co(c0, c1, co(c3, c1, co(c2, c1, c4)))), wcel(c6, cmnd), wcel(c0, c5), wcel(c3, c5), wcel(co(c2, c1, c4), c5))
  syl3anc(w0, wcel(co(c2, c1, c4), c5), wcel(c6, cmnd), wcel(c2, c5), wcel(c4, c5))

blocks.name: mndidcl
blocks.content: The identity element of a monoid belongs to the monoid. (Contributed by NM, 27-Aug-2011.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 27-Dec-2014.)
blocks.origin:

}

blocks.name: ismndd
blocks.content: Deduce a monoid from its properties. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 6-Jan-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm ismndd(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wcel(c0, cmnd))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(c1, cfv(cbs, c0)))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(c2, cfv(cplusg, c0)))
  -| wi(w3a(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c1)), wcel(co(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1)), c1))
  -| wi(wa(w0, w3a(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c1), wcel(cv(s2), c1))), wceq(co(co(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1)), c2, cv(s2)), co(cv(s0), c2, co(cv(s1), c2, cv(s2)))))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, c1))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c1)), wceq(co(c3, c2, cv(s0)), cv(s0)))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c1)), wceq(co(cv(s0), c2, c3), cv(s0)))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c1)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
  -| diffsw(s2, w0)
} = {

blocks.name: mndpfo
blocks.content: The addition operation of a monoid as a function is an onto function. (Contributed by FL, 2-Nov-2009.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 11-Oct-2013.) (Revised by AV, 23-Jan-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm mndpfo(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cmnd), wfo(c1, cxp(c2, c2), c2))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c0))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(cplusf, c0))
} = {
  sylanbrc(wcel(c0, cmnd), wfo(c1, cxp(c2, c2), c2), wf(c1, cxp(c2, c2), c2), wral(hs0, c2, wrex(hs1, c2, wrex(hs2, c2, wceq(cv(hs0), co(cv(hs1), c1, cv(hs2)))))))
  mndplusf(c0, c1, c2)
  ralrimiva(hs0, c2, wcel(c0, cmnd), wrex(hs1, c2, wrex(hs2, c2, wceq(cv(hs0), co(cv(hs1), c1, cv(hs2))))))
  sylibr(wa(wcel(c0, cmnd), wcel(cv(hs0), c2)), wrex(hs1, c2, wrex(hs2, c2, wceq(cv(hs0), co(cv(hs1), c1, cv(hs2))))), wrex(hs1, c2, wrex(hs2, c2, wceq(cv(hs0), co(cv(hs1), cfv(cplusg, c0), cv(hs2))))))
  syl3anc(wa(wcel(c0, cmnd), wcel(cv(hs0), c2)), wrex(hs1, c2, wrex(hs2, c2, wceq(cv(hs0), co(cv(hs1), cfv(cplusg, c0), cv(hs2))))), wcel(cv(hs0), c2), wcel(cfv(c0g, c0), c2), wceq(cv(hs0), co(cv(hs0), cfv(cplusg, c0), cfv(c0g, c0))))
  simpr(wcel(c0, cmnd), wcel(cv(hs0), c2))
  adantr(wcel(c0, cmnd), wcel(cv(hs0), c2), wcel(cfv(c0g, c0), c2))
  mndidcl(c0, cfv(c0g, c0), c2)
  eqcomd(cv(hs0), co(cv(hs0), cfv(cplusg, c0), cfv(c0g, c0)), wa(wcel(c0, cmnd), wcel(cv(hs0), c2)))
  mndrid(c0, cv(hs0), c2, cfv(cplusg, c0), cfv(c0g, c0))
  eqid(cfv(c0g, c0))
  rspceov(hs1, hs2, cv(hs0), c2, cfv(c0g, c0), c2, cv(hs0), cfv(cplusg, c0))
  2rexbiia(hs1, hs2, c2, c2, wceq(cv(hs0), co(cv(hs1), c1, cv(hs2))), wceq(cv(hs0), co(cv(hs1), cfv(cplusg, c0), cv(hs2))))
  eqeq2d(cv(hs0), co(cv(hs1), c1, cv(hs2)), co(cv(hs1), cfv(cplusg, c0), cv(hs2)), wa(wcel(cv(hs1), c2), wcel(cv(hs2), c2)))
  plusfval(cv(hs1), c2, cv(hs2), c1, cfv(cplusg, c0), c0)
  eqid(cfv(cplusg, c0))
  foov(hs0, hs1, hs2, c1, c2, c2, c2)
  diff.hs0.w(wcel(c0, cmnd))
  diff.hs1.s(hs2)
  diff.hs1.c(cv(hs0))
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
  diff.hs1.c(cfv(cplusg, c0))
  diff.hs2.c(cv(hs0))
  diff.hs2.c(cfv(c0g, c0))
  diff.hs2.c(c2)
  diff.hs2.c(cfv(cplusg, c0))
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.s(hs2)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs2.c(c1)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm mndpfo(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ⊢ (c0 ∈ Mnd →(c1 :(c2 × c2)↠ c2))
  ⊣ c2 =(Base ` c0)
  ⊣ c1 =(+f ` c0)
} = {
  sylanbrc(c0 ∈ Mnd, (c1 :(c2 × c2)↠ c2), (c1 :(c2 × c2)→ c2), ∀(hs0 ∈ c2, ∃(hs1 ∈ c2, ∃(hs2 ∈ c2, hs0 =(hs1[c1]hs2)))))
  mndplusf(c0, c1, c2)
  ralrimiva(hs0, c2, c0 ∈ Mnd, ∃(hs1 ∈ c2, ∃(hs2 ∈ c2, hs0 =(hs1[c1]hs2))))
  sylibr((c0 ∈ Mnd ∧ hs0 ∈ c2), ∃(hs1 ∈ c2, ∃(hs2 ∈ c2, hs0 =(hs1[c1]hs2))), ∃(hs1 ∈ c2, ∃(hs2 ∈ c2, hs0 =(hs1[(+ ` c0)]hs2))))
  syl3anc((c0 ∈ Mnd ∧ hs0 ∈ c2), ∃(hs1 ∈ c2, ∃(hs2 ∈ c2, hs0 =(hs1[(+ ` c0)]hs2))), hs0 ∈ c2, (0 ` c0)∈ c2, hs0 =(hs0[(+ ` c0)](0 ` c0)))
  simpr(c0 ∈ Mnd, hs0 ∈ c2)
  adantr(c0 ∈ Mnd, hs0 ∈ c2, (0 ` c0)∈ c2)
  mndidcl(c0, (0 ` c0), c2)
  eqcomd(hs0, (hs0[(+ ` c0)](0 ` c0)), (c0 ∈ Mnd ∧ hs0 ∈ c2))
  mndrid(c0, hs0, c2, (+ ` c0), (0 ` c0))
  eqid((0 ` c0))
  rspceov(hs1, hs2, hs0, c2, (0 ` c0), c2, hs0, (+ ` c0))
  2rexbiia(hs1, hs2, c2, c2, hs0 =(hs1[c1]hs2), hs0 =(hs1[(+ ` c0)]hs2))
  eqeq2d(hs0, (hs1[c1]hs2), (hs1[(+ ` c0)]hs2), (hs1 ∈ c2 ∧ hs2 ∈ c2))
  plusfval(hs1, c2, hs2, c1, (+ ` c0), c0)
  eqid((+ ` c0))
  foov(hs0, hs1, hs2, c1, c2, c2, c2)
  diff.hs0.w(c0 ∈ Mnd)
  diff.hs1.s(hs2)
  diff.hs1.c(hs0)
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
  diff.hs1.c((+ ` c0))
  diff.hs2.c(hs0)
  diff.hs2.c((0 ` c0))
  diff.hs2.c(c2)
  diff.hs2.c((+ ` c0))
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.s(hs2)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs2.c(c1)
}

blocks.name: mndfo
blocks.content: The addition operation of a monoid is an onto function (assuming it is a function). (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 11-Oct-2013.) (Proof shortened by AV, 23-Jan-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm mndfo(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cmnd), wfn(c1, cxp(c2, c2))), wfo(c1, cxp(c2, c2), c2))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c0))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(cplusg, c0))
} = {
  mpbird(wa(wcel(c0, cmnd), wfn(c1, cxp(c2, c2))), wfo(c1, cxp(c2, c2), c2), wfo(cfv(cplusf, c0), cxp(c2, c2), c2))
  adantr(wcel(c0, cmnd), wfn(c1, cxp(c2, c2)), wfo(cfv(cplusf, c0), cxp(c2, c2), c2))
  mndpfo(c0, cfv(cplusf, c0), c2)
  syl(wa(wcel(c0, cmnd), wfn(c1, cxp(c2, c2))), wb(wfo(c1, cxp(c2, c2), c2), wfo(cfv(cplusf, c0), cxp(c2, c2), c2)), wceq(c1, cfv(cplusf, c0)))
  adantl(wcel(c0, cmnd), wfn(c1, cxp(c2, c2)), wceq(c1, cfv(cplusf, c0)))
  eqcomd(c1, cfv(cplusf, c0), wfn(c1, cxp(c2, c2)))
  plusfeq(c1, c2, cfv(cplusf, c0), c0)
  eqid(cfv(cplusf, c0))
  foeq1(c1, cfv(cplusf, c0), cxp(c2, c2), c2)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm mndfo(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ Mnd ∧ c1[Fn](c2 × c2))→(c1 :(c2 × c2)↠ c2))
  ⊣ c2 =(Base ` c0)
  ⊣ c1 =(+ ` c0)
} = {
  mpbird((c0 ∈ Mnd ∧ c1[Fn](c2 × c2)), (c1 :(c2 × c2)↠ c2), ((+f ` c0):(c2 × c2)↠ c2))
  adantr(c0 ∈ Mnd, c1[Fn](c2 × c2), ((+f ` c0):(c2 × c2)↠ c2))
  mndpfo(c0, (+f ` c0), c2)
  syl((c0 ∈ Mnd ∧ c1[Fn](c2 × c2)), ((c1 :(c2 × c2)↠ c2)↔((+f ` c0):(c2 × c2)↠ c2)), c1 =(+f ` c0))
  adantl(c0 ∈ Mnd, c1[Fn](c2 × c2), c1 =(+f ` c0))
  eqcomd(c1, (+f ` c0), c1[Fn](c2 × c2))
  plusfeq(c1, c2, (+f ` c0), c0)
  eqid((+f ` c0))
  foeq1(c1, (+f ` c0), (c2 × c2), c2)
}

blocks.name: mndpropd
blocks.content: If two structures have the same base set, and the values of their group (addition) operations are equal for all pairs of elements of the base set, one is a monoid iff the other one is. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 6-Jan-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm mndpropd(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wb(wcel(c0, cmnd), wcel(c1, cmnd)))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c0)))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c1)))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c2), wcel(cv(s1), c2))), wceq(co(cv(s0), cfv(cplusg, c0), cv(s1)), co(cv(s0), cfv(cplusg, c1), cv(s1))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)

blocks.name: mndprop
blocks.content: If two structures have the same group components (properties), one is a monoid iff the other one is. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 11-Oct-2013.)
blocks.origin:
thm mndprop(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wb(wcel(c0, cmnd), wcel(c1, cmnd))
  -| wceq(cfv(cbs, c0), cfv(cbs, c1))
  -| wceq(cfv(cplusg, c0), cfv(cplusg, c1))
} = {
  mptru(wb(wcel(c0, cmnd), wcel(c1, cmnd)))
  mndpropd(hs0, hs1, c0, c1, cfv(cbs, c0), wtru)
  eqidd(cfv(cbs, c0), wtru)
  a1i(wtru, wceq(cfv(cbs, c0), cfv(cbs, c1)))
  a1i(wa(wtru, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cbs, c0)), wcel(cv(hs1), cfv(cbs, c0)))), wceq(co(cv(hs0), cfv(cplusg, c0), cv(hs1)), co(cv(hs0), cfv(cplusg, c1), cv(hs1))))
  oveqi(cv(hs0), cfv(cplusg, c0), cv(hs1), cfv(cplusg, c1))
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(cfv(cbs, c0))
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(cfv(cbs, c0))
  diff.hs0.w(wtru)
  diff.hs1.w(wtru)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm mndprop(class c0, class c1) {
  ⊢ (c0 ∈ Mnd ↔ c1 ∈ Mnd)
  ⊣ (Base ` c0)=(Base ` c1)
  ⊣ (+ ` c0)=(+ ` c1)
} = {
  mptru((c0 ∈ Mnd ↔ c1 ∈ Mnd))
  mndpropd(hs0, hs1, c0, c1, (Base ` c0), wtru)
  eqidd((Base ` c0), wtru)
  a1i(wtru, (Base ` c0)=(Base ` c1))
  a1i((T ∧(hs0 ∈(Base ` c0)∧ hs1 ∈(Base ` c0))), (hs0[(+ ` c0)]hs1)=(hs0[(+ ` c1)]hs1))
  oveqi(hs0, (+ ` c0), hs1, (+ ` c1))
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c((Base ` c0))
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c((Base ` c0))
  diff.hs0.w(wtru)
  diff.hs1.w(wtru)
}

blocks.name: issubmnd
blocks.content: Characterize a submonoid by closure properties. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 10-Jan-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm issubmnd(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {

  diff.hs1.w(((c0 ∈ Mnd ∧ c1 ⊆ c2 ∧ c3 ∈ c1)∧ ∀(s0 ∈ c1, ∀(s1 ∈ c1,(s0[c5]s1)∈ c1))))
  diff.hs2.w(((c0 ∈ Mnd ∧ c1 ⊆ c2 ∧ c3 ∈ c1)∧ ∀(s0 ∈ c1, ∀(s1 ∈ c1,(s0[c5]s1)∈ c1))))
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)

blocks.name: ress0g
blocks.content: ` 0g ` is unaffected by restriction. This is a bit more generic than ~ submnd0 . (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 23-Oct-2017.)

thm ress0g(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, cmnd), wcel(c1, c2), wss(c2, c3)), wceq(c1, cfv(c0g, c4)))
  -| wceq(c4, co(c0, cress, c2))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(cbs, c0))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(c0g, c0))
} = {
  grpidd(hs0, c1, c4, c2, cfv(cplusg, c0), w3a(wcel(c0, cmnd), wcel(c1, c2), wss(c2, c3)))
  3ad2ant3(wcel(c0, cmnd), wcel(c1, c2), wss(c2, c3), wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c4)))
  ressbas2(c2, c3, c4, c0)

  sylancl(w3a(wcel(c0, cmnd), wcel(c1, c2), wss(c2, c3)), wcel(c2, universe), wss(c2, c3), wcel(c3, universe))
  fvexi(c3, cbs, c0)
  ssexg(c2, c3, universe)
  ressplusg(c2, universe, cfv(cplusg, c0), c4, c0)
  simp2(wcel(c0, cmnd), wcel(c1, c2), wss(c2, c3))
  syl2anc(wa(w3a(wcel(c0, cmnd), wcel(c1, c2), wss(c2, c3)), wcel(cv(hs0), c2)), wceq(co(c1, cfv(cplusg, c0), cv(hs0)), cv(hs0)), wcel(c0, cmnd), wcel(cv(hs0), c3))
  mndlid(c0, cv(hs0), c3, c1, cfv(cplusg, c0))
  syl2anc(wa(w3a(wcel(c0, cmnd), wcel(c1, c2), wss(c2, c3)), wcel(cv(hs0), c2)), wceq(co(cv(hs0), cfv(cplusg, c0), c1), cv(hs0)), wcel(c0, cmnd), wcel(cv(hs0), c3))
  simpl1(wcel(c0, cmnd), wcel(c1, c2), wss(c2, c3), wcel(cv(hs0), c2))
  sselda(cv(hs0), c2, c3, w3a(wcel(c0, cmnd), wcel(c1, c2), wss(c2, c3)))
  simp3(wcel(c0, cmnd), wcel(c1, c2), wss(c2, c3))
  mndrid(c0, cv(hs0), c3, cfv(cplusg, c0), c1)
  eqid(cfv(cplusg, c0))
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c4)
  diff.hs0.w(w3a(wcel(c0, cmnd), wcel(c1, c2), wss(c2, c3)))
}

thm ress0g(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ Mnd ∧ c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c2 ⊆ c3)→ c1 =(0 ` c4))
  ⊣ c4 =(c0[|`s]c2)
  ⊣ c3 =(Base ` c0)
  ⊣ c1 =(0 ` c0)
} = {
  grpidd(hs0, c1, c4, c2, (+ ` c0), (c0 ∈ Mnd ∧ c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c2 ⊆ c3))
  3ad2ant3(c0 ∈ Mnd, c1 ∈ c2, c2 ⊆ c3, c2 =(Base ` c4))
  ressbas2(c2, c3, c4, c0)
  syl((c0 ∈ Mnd ∧ c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c2 ⊆ c3), (+ ` c0)=(+ ` c4), c2 ∈ 𝕌)
  sylancl((c0 ∈ Mnd ∧ c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c2 ⊆ c3), c2 ∈ 𝕌, c2 ⊆ c3, c3 ∈ 𝕌)
  fvexi(c3, cbs, c0)
  ssexg(c2, c3, universe)
  ressplusg(c2, universe, (+ ` c0), c4, c0)
  simp2(c0 ∈ Mnd, c1 ∈ c2, c2 ⊆ c3)
  syl2anc(((c0 ∈ Mnd ∧ c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c2 ⊆ c3)∧ hs0 ∈ c2), (c1[(+ ` c0)]hs0)= hs0, c0 ∈ Mnd, hs0 ∈ c3)
  mndlid(c0, hs0, c3, c1, (+ ` c0))
  syl2anc(((c0 ∈ Mnd ∧ c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c2 ⊆ c3)∧ hs0 ∈ c2), (hs0[(+ ` c0)]c1)= hs0, c0 ∈ Mnd, hs0 ∈ c3)
  simpl1(c0 ∈ Mnd, c1 ∈ c2, c2 ⊆ c3, hs0 ∈ c2)
  sselda(hs0, c2, c3, (c0 ∈ Mnd ∧ c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c2 ⊆ c3))
  simp3(c0 ∈ Mnd, c1 ∈ c2, c2 ⊆ c3)
  mndrid(c0, hs0, c3, (+ ` c0), c1)
  eqid((+ ` c0))
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c4)
  diff.hs0.w((c0 ∈ Mnd ∧ c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c2 ⊆ c3))
}

blocks.name: submnd0
blocks.content: The zero of a submonoid is the same as the zero in the parent monoid. (Note that we must add the condition that the zero of the parent monoid is actually contained in the submonoid, because it is possible to have "subsets that are monoids" which are not submonoids because they have a different identity element.) (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 10-Jan-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm submnd0(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  |- wi(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cmnd), wcel(c1, cmnd)), wa(wss(c2, c3), wcel(c4, c2))), wceq(c4, cfv(c0g, c1)))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(cbs, c0))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(c0g, c0))
  -| wceq(c1, co(c0, cress, c2))
} = {
  ismgmid2(hs0, c4, cfv(c0g, c1), cfv(cbs, c1), c1, cfv(cplusg, c1), wa(wa(wcel(c0, cmnd), wcel(c1, cmnd)), wa(wss(c2, c3), wcel(c4, c2))))
  eqid(cfv(cbs, c1))
  eqid(cfv(c0g, c1))
  eqid(cfv(cplusg, c1))
  eleqtrd(c4, cfv(cbs, c1), c2, wa(wa(wcel(c0, cmnd), wcel(c1, cmnd)), wa(wss(c2, c3), wcel(c4, c2))))
  simprr(wa(wcel(c0, cmnd), wcel(c1, cmnd)), wss(c2, c3), wcel(c4, c2))
  eqtr3d(co(c4, cfv(cplusg, c1), cv(hs0)), cv(hs0), co(c4, cfv(cplusg, c0), cv(hs0)), wa(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cmnd), wcel(c1, cmnd)), wa(wss(c2, c3), wcel(c4, c2))), wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cbs, c1))))
  oveqd(c4, cfv(cplusg, c0), cv(hs0), cfv(cplusg, c1), wa(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cmnd), wcel(c1, cmnd)), wa(wss(c2, c3), wcel(c4, c2))), wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cbs, c1))))
  syl2an(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cmnd), wcel(c1, cmnd)), wa(wss(c2, c3), wcel(c4, c2))), wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cbs, c1)), wceq(co(c4, cfv(cplusg, c0), cv(hs0)), cv(hs0)), wcel(c0, cmnd), wcel(cv(hs0), c3))
  mndlid(c0, cv(hs0), c3, c4, cfv(cplusg, c0))
  eqtr3d(co(cv(hs0), cfv(cplusg, c1), c4), cv(hs0), co(cv(hs0), cfv(cplusg, c0), c4), wa(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cmnd), wcel(c1, cmnd)), wa(wss(c2, c3), wcel(c4, c2))), wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cbs, c1))))
  oveqd(cv(hs0), cfv(cplusg, c0), c4, cfv(cplusg, c1), wa(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cmnd), wcel(c1, cmnd)), wa(wss(c2, c3), wcel(c4, c2))), wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cbs, c1))))
  syl(wa(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cmnd), wcel(c1, cmnd)), wa(wss(c2, c3), wcel(c4, c2))), wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cbs, c1))), wceq(cfv(cplusg, c0), cfv(cplusg, c1)), wcel(c2, universe))
  adantr(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cmnd), wcel(c1, cmnd)), wa(wss(c2, c3), wcel(c4, c2))), wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cbs, c1)), wcel(c2, universe))
  syl6eqel(c2, universe, cfv(cbs, c1), wa(wa(wcel(c0, cmnd), wcel(c1, cmnd)), wa(wss(c2, c3), wcel(c4, c2))))
  ad2antrl(wa(wcel(c0, cmnd), wcel(c1, cmnd)), wss(c2, c3), wcel(c4, c2), wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c1)))
  ressbas2(c2, c3, c1, c0)
  fvex(cbs, c1)
  ressplusg(c2, universe, cfv(cplusg, c0), c1, c0)
  syl2an(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cmnd), wcel(c1, cmnd)), wa(wss(c2, c3), wcel(c4, c2))), wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cbs, c1)), wceq(co(cv(hs0), cfv(cplusg, c0), c4), cv(hs0)), wcel(c0, cmnd), wcel(cv(hs0), c3))
  simpll(wcel(c0, cmnd), wcel(c1, cmnd), wa(wss(c2, c3), wcel(c4, c2)))
  sseli(cv(hs0), cfv(cbs, c1), c3)
  ressbasss(c1, c3, c0, c2)
  mndrid(c0, cv(hs0), c3, cfv(cplusg, c0), c4)
  eqid(cfv(cplusg, c0))
  diff.hs0.c(c4)
  diff.hs0.c(cfv(c0g, c1))
  diff.hs0.c(cfv(cbs, c1))
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(cfv(cplusg, c1))
  diff.hs0.w(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cmnd), wcel(c1, cmnd)), wa(wss(c2, c3), wcel(c4, c2))))
}

thm submnd0(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  ⊢ (((c0 ∈ Mnd ∧ c1 ∈ Mnd)∧(c2 ⊆ c3 ∧ c4 ∈ c2))→ c4 =(0 ` c1))
  ⊣ c3 =(Base ` c0)
  ⊣ c4 =(0 ` c0)
  ⊣ c1 =(c0[|`s]c2)
} = {
  ismgmid2(hs0, c4, (0 ` c1), (Base ` c1), c1, (+ ` c1), ((c0 ∈ Mnd ∧ c1 ∈ Mnd)∧(c2 ⊆ c3 ∧ c4 ∈ c2)))
  eqid((Base ` c1))
  eqid((0 ` c1))
  eqid((+ ` c1))
  eleqtrd(c4, (Base ` c1), c2, ((c0 ∈ Mnd ∧ c1 ∈ Mnd)∧(c2 ⊆ c3 ∧ c4 ∈ c2)))
  simprr((c0 ∈ Mnd ∧ c1 ∈ Mnd), c2 ⊆ c3, c4 ∈ c2)
  eqtr3d((c4[(+ ` c1)]hs0), hs0, (c4[(+ ` c0)]hs0), (((c0 ∈ Mnd ∧ c1 ∈ Mnd)∧(c2 ⊆ c3 ∧ c4 ∈ c2))∧ hs0 ∈(Base ` c1)))
  oveqd(c4, (+ ` c0), hs0, (+ ` c1), (((c0 ∈ Mnd ∧ c1 ∈ Mnd)∧(c2 ⊆ c3 ∧ c4 ∈ c2))∧ hs0 ∈(Base ` c1)))
  syl2an(((c0 ∈ Mnd ∧ c1 ∈ Mnd)∧(c2 ⊆ c3 ∧ c4 ∈ c2)), hs0 ∈(Base ` c1), (c4[(+ ` c0)]hs0)= hs0, c0 ∈ Mnd, hs0 ∈ c3)
  mndlid(c0, hs0, c3, c4, (+ ` c0))
  eqtr3d((hs0[(+ ` c1)]c4), hs0, (hs0[(+ ` c0)]c4), (((c0 ∈ Mnd ∧ c1 ∈ Mnd)∧(c2 ⊆ c3 ∧ c4 ∈ c2))∧ hs0 ∈(Base ` c1)))
  oveqd(hs0, (+ ` c0), c4, (+ ` c1), (((c0 ∈ Mnd ∧ c1 ∈ Mnd)∧(c2 ⊆ c3 ∧ c4 ∈ c2))∧ hs0 ∈(Base ` c1)))
  syl((((c0 ∈ Mnd ∧ c1 ∈ Mnd)∧(c2 ⊆ c3 ∧ c4 ∈ c2))∧ hs0 ∈(Base ` c1)), (+ ` c0)=(+ ` c1), c2 ∈ 𝕌)
  adantr(((c0 ∈ Mnd ∧ c1 ∈ Mnd)∧(c2 ⊆ c3 ∧ c4 ∈ c2)), hs0 ∈(Base ` c1), c2 ∈ 𝕌)
  syl6eqel(c2, universe, (Base ` c1), ((c0 ∈ Mnd ∧ c1 ∈ Mnd)∧(c2 ⊆ c3 ∧ c4 ∈ c2)))
  ad2antrl((c0 ∈ Mnd ∧ c1 ∈ Mnd), c2 ⊆ c3, c4 ∈ c2, c2 =(Base ` c1))
  ressbas2(c2, c3, c1, c0)
  fvex(cbs, c1)
  ressplusg(c2, universe, (+ ` c0), c1, c0)
  syl2an(((c0 ∈ Mnd ∧ c1 ∈ Mnd)∧(c2 ⊆ c3 ∧ c4 ∈ c2)), hs0 ∈(Base ` c1), (hs0[(+ ` c0)]c4)= hs0, c0 ∈ Mnd, hs0 ∈ c3)
  simpll(c0 ∈ Mnd, c1 ∈ Mnd, (c2 ⊆ c3 ∧ c4 ∈ c2))
  sseli(hs0, (Base ` c1), c3)
  ressbasss(c1, c3, c0, c2)
  mndrid(c0, hs0, c3, (+ ` c0), c4)
  eqid((+ ` c0))
  diff.hs0.c(c4)
  diff.hs0.c((0 ` c1))
  diff.hs0.c((Base ` c1))
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c((+ ` c1))
  diff.hs0.w(((c0 ∈ Mnd ∧ c1 ∈ Mnd)∧(c2 ⊆ c3 ∧ c4 ∈ c2)))
}

blocks.name: prdsplusgcl
blocks.content: Structure product pointwise sums are closed when the factors are monoids. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 10-Jan-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm prdsplusgcl(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, class c8, class c9, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wcel(co(c0, c1, c2), c3))
  -| wceq(c4, co(c5, cprds, c6))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(cbs, c4))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(cplusg, c4))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c5, c7))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c8, c9))
  -| wi(w0, wf(c6, c8, cmnd))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c3))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, c3))
} = {
  eqeltrd(co(c0, c1, c2), c3, cmpt(hs0, c8, co(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), cfv(cplusg, cfv(c6, cv(hs0))), cfv(c2, cv(hs0)))), w0)
  prdsplusgval(hs0, c0, c1, c2, c8, c6, c4, c5, c3, c7, c9, w0)
  mpbird(w0, wcel(cmpt(hs0, c8, co(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), cfv(cplusg, cfv(c6, cv(hs0))), cfv(c2, cv(hs0)))), c3), wral(hs0, c8, wcel(co(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), cfv(cplusg, cfv(c6, cv(hs0))), cfv(c2, cv(hs0))), cfv(cbs, cfv(c6, cv(hs0))))))
  ralrimiva(hs0, c8, w0, wcel(co(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), cfv(cplusg, cfv(c6, cv(hs0))), cfv(c2, cv(hs0))), cfv(cbs, cfv(c6, cv(hs0)))))
  syl3anc(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c8)), wcel(co(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), cfv(cplusg, cfv(c6, cv(hs0))), cfv(c2, cv(hs0))), cfv(cbs, cfv(c6, cv(hs0)))), wcel(cfv(c6, cv(hs0)), cmnd), wcel(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), cfv(cbs, cfv(c6, cv(hs0)))), wcel(cfv(c2, cv(hs0)), cfv(cbs, cfv(c6, cv(hs0)))))
  ffvelrnda(cv(hs0), c8, c6, cmnd, w0)
  prdsbasprj(c0, cv(hs0), c6, c4, c5, c3, c7, c8, c9, wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c8)))
  adantr(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c8), wcel(c0, c3))
  prdsbasprj(c2, cv(hs0), c6, c4, c5, c3, c7, c8, c9, wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c8)))
  adantr(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c8), wcel(c5, c7))
  adantr(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c8), wcel(c8, c9))
  adantr(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c8), wfn(c6, c8))
  adantr(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c8), wcel(c2, c3))
  simpr(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c8))
  mndcl(cfv(c6, cv(hs0)), cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), cfv(cbs, cfv(c6, cv(hs0))), cfv(c2, cv(hs0)), cfv(cplusg, cfv(c6, cv(hs0))))
  eqid(cfv(cbs, cfv(c6, cv(hs0))))
  eqid(cfv(cplusg, cfv(c6, cv(hs0))))
  prdsbasmpt(hs0, c8, co(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), cfv(cplusg, cfv(c6, cv(hs0))), cfv(c2, cv(hs0))), c3, c6, c4, c5, c7, c9, w0)
  ffnd(c6, c8, cmnd, w0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c8)
  diff.hs0.c(c6)
  diff.hs0.c(c4)
  diff.hs0.c(c5)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.c(c7)
  diff.hs0.c(c9)
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm prdsplusgcl(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, class c8, class c9, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 →(c0[c1]c2)∈ c3)
  ⊣ c4 =(c5[×]c6)
  ⊣ c3 =(Base ` c4)
  ⊣ c1 =(+ ` c4)
  ⊣ (w0 → c5 ∈ c7)
  ⊣ (w0 → c8 ∈ c9)
  ⊣ (w0 →(c6 : c8 → Mnd))
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈ c3)
  ⊣ (w0 → c2 ∈ c3)
} = {
  eqeltrd((c0[c1]c2), c3, (hs0 ∈ c8 ↦((c0 ` hs0)[(+ `(c6 ` hs0))](c2 ` hs0))), w0)
  prdsplusgval(hs0, c0, c1, c2, c8, c6, c4, c5, c3, c7, c9, w0)
  mpbird(w0, (hs0 ∈ c8 ↦((c0 ` hs0)[(+ `(c6 ` hs0))](c2 ` hs0)))∈ c3, ∀(hs0 ∈ c8,((c0 ` hs0)[(+ `(c6 ` hs0))](c2 ` hs0))∈(Base `(c6 ` hs0))))
  ralrimiva(hs0, c8, w0, ((c0 ` hs0)[(+ `(c6 ` hs0))](c2 ` hs0))∈(Base `(c6 ` hs0)))
  syl3anc((w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ c8), ((c0 ` hs0)[(+ `(c6 ` hs0))](c2 ` hs0))∈(Base `(c6 ` hs0)), (c6 ` hs0)∈ Mnd, (c0 ` hs0)∈(Base `(c6 ` hs0)), (c2 ` hs0)∈(Base `(c6 ` hs0)))
  ffvelrnda(hs0, c8, c6, cmnd, w0)
  prdsbasprj(c0, hs0, c6, c4, c5, c3, c7, c8, c9, (w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ c8))
  adantr(w0, hs0 ∈ c8, c0 ∈ c3)
  prdsbasprj(c2, hs0, c6, c4, c5, c3, c7, c8, c9, (w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ c8))
  adantr(w0, hs0 ∈ c8, c5 ∈ c7)
  adantr(w0, hs0 ∈ c8, c8 ∈ c9)
  adantr(w0, hs0 ∈ c8, c6[Fn]c8)
  adantr(w0, hs0 ∈ c8, c2 ∈ c3)
  simpr(w0, hs0 ∈ c8)
  mndcl((c6 ` hs0), (c0 ` hs0), (Base `(c6 ` hs0)), (c2 ` hs0), (+ `(c6 ` hs0)))
  eqid((Base `(c6 ` hs0)))
  eqid((+ `(c6 ` hs0)))
  prdsbasmpt(hs0, c8, ((c0 ` hs0)[(+ `(c6 ` hs0))](c2 ` hs0)), c3, c6, c4, c5, c7, c9, w0)
  ffnd(c6, c8, cmnd, w0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c8)
  diff.hs0.c(c6)
  diff.hs0.c(c4)
  diff.hs0.c(c5)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.c(c7)
  diff.hs0.c(c9)
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
}

blocks.content: Characterization of identity in a structure product. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 10-Jan-2015.)

thm prdsidlem(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, class c8, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wa(wcel(c0, c1), wral(s0, c1, wa(wceq(co(c0, c2, cv(s0)), cv(s0)), wceq(co(cv(s0), c2, c0), cv(s0))))))
  -| wceq(c3, co(c4, cprds, c5))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(cbs, c3))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cplusg, c3))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c4, c6))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c7, c8))
  -| wi(w0, wf(c5, c7, cmnd))
  -| wceq(c0, ccom(c0g, c5))
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
  -| diffsc(s0, c5)
  -| diffsc(s0, c6)
  -| diffsc(s0, c7)
  -| diffsc(s0, c8)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
} = {
  a1ii(wi(w0, wa(wcel(c0, c1), wral(s0, c1, wa(wceq(co(c0, c2, cv(s0)), cv(s0)), wceq(co(cv(s0), c2, c0), cv(s0)))))), diffsc(s0, c1))
  a1ii(wi(w0, wa(wcel(c0, c1), wral(s0, c1, wa(wceq(co(c0, c2, cv(s0)), cv(s0)), wceq(co(cv(s0), c2, c0), cv(s0)))))), diffsc(s0, c2))
  a1ii(wi(w0, wa(wcel(c0, c1), wral(s0, c1, wa(wceq(co(c0, c2, cv(s0)), cv(s0)), wceq(co(cv(s0), c2, c0), cv(s0)))))), diffsc(s0, c3))
  a1ii(wi(w0, wa(wcel(c0, c1), wral(s0, c1, wa(wceq(co(c0, c2, cv(s0)), cv(s0)), wceq(co(cv(s0), c2, c0), cv(s0)))))), diffsc(s0, c4))
  a1ii(wi(w0, wa(wcel(c0, c1), wral(s0, c1, wa(wceq(co(c0, c2, cv(s0)), cv(s0)), wceq(co(cv(s0), c2, c0), cv(s0)))))), diffsc(s0, c6))
  a1ii(wi(w0, wa(wcel(c0, c1), wral(s0, c1, wa(wceq(co(c0, c2, cv(s0)), cv(s0)), wceq(co(cv(s0), c2, c0), cv(s0)))))), diffsc(s0, c7))
  a1ii(wi(w0, wa(wcel(c0, c1), wral(s0, c1, wa(wceq(co(c0, c2, cv(s0)), cv(s0)), wceq(co(cv(s0), c2, c0), cv(s0)))))), diffsc(s0, c8))
  jca(w0, wcel(c0, c1), wral(s0, c1, wa(wceq(co(c0, c2, cv(s0)), cv(s0)), wceq(co(cv(s0), c2, c0), cv(s0)))))
  ralrimiva(s0, c1, w0, wa(wceq(co(c0, c2, cv(s0)), cv(s0)), wceq(co(cv(s0), c2, c0), cv(s0))))
  jca(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c1)), wceq(co(c0, c2, cv(s0)), cv(s0)), wceq(co(cv(s0), c2, c0), cv(s0)))
  3eqtr4d(co(c0, c2, cv(s0)), cv(s0), cmpt(hs0, c7, co(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), cfv(cplusg, cfv(c5, cv(hs0))), cfv(cv(s0), cv(hs0)))), cmpt(hs0, c7, cfv(cv(s0), cv(hs0))), wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c1)))
  mpteq2dva(hs0, c7, co(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), cfv(cplusg, cfv(c5, cv(hs0))), cfv(cv(s0), cv(hs0))), cfv(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c1)))
  eqtrd(co(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), cfv(cplusg, cfv(c5, cv(hs0))), cfv(cv(s0), cv(hs0))), cfv(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), co(cfv(c0g, cfv(c5, cv(hs0))), cfv(cplusg, cfv(c5, cv(hs0))), cfv(cv(s0), cv(hs0))), wa(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), c7)))
  oveq1d(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), cfv(cplusg, cfv(c5, cv(hs0))), cfv(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), cfv(c0g, cfv(c5, cv(hs0))), wa(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), c7)))
  syl2anc(wa(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), c7)), wceq(co(cfv(c0g, cfv(c5, cv(hs0))), cfv(cplusg, cfv(c5, cv(hs0))), cfv(cv(s0), cv(hs0))), cfv(cv(s0), cv(hs0))), wcel(cfv(c5, cv(hs0)), cmnd), wcel(cfv(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), cfv(cbs, cfv(c5, cv(hs0)))))
  mndlid(cfv(c5, cv(hs0)), cfv(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), cfv(cbs, cfv(c5, cv(hs0))), cfv(c0g, cfv(c5, cv(hs0))), cfv(cplusg, cfv(c5, cv(hs0))))
  prdsplusgval(hs0, c0, c2, cv(s0), c7, c5, c3, c4, c1, c6, c8, wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c1)))
  3eqtr4d(co(cv(s0), c2, c0), cv(s0), cmpt(hs0, c7, co(cfv(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), cfv(cplusg, cfv(c5, cv(hs0))), cfv(c0, cv(hs0)))), cmpt(hs0, c7, cfv(cv(s0), cv(hs0))), wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c1)))
  mpteq2dva(hs0, c7, co(cfv(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), cfv(cplusg, cfv(c5, cv(hs0))), cfv(c0, cv(hs0))), cfv(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c1)))
  eqtrd(co(cfv(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), cfv(cplusg, cfv(c5, cv(hs0))), cfv(c0, cv(hs0))), cfv(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), co(cfv(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), cfv(cplusg, cfv(c5, cv(hs0))), cfv(c0g, cfv(c5, cv(hs0)))), wa(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), c7)))
  oveq2d(cfv(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), cfv(cplusg, cfv(c5, cv(hs0))), cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), cfv(c0g, cfv(c5, cv(hs0))), wa(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), c7)))
  adantlr(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(hs0), c7), wceq(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), cfv(c0g, cfv(c5, cv(hs0)))))
  syl5eq(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), cfv(c0g, cfv(c5, cv(hs0))), cfv(ccom(c0g, c5), cv(hs0)), wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c7)))
  fveq1i(c0, cv(hs0), ccom(c0g, c5))
  sylan(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c7), wceq(cfv(ccom(c0g, c5), cv(hs0)), cfv(c0g, cfv(c5, cv(hs0)))), wfn(c5, c7))
  fvco2(c5, c7, cv(hs0), c0g)
  syl2anc(wa(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), c7)), wceq(co(cfv(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), cfv(cplusg, cfv(c5, cv(hs0))), cfv(c0g, cfv(c5, cv(hs0)))), cfv(cv(s0), cv(hs0))), wcel(cfv(c5, cv(hs0)), cmnd), wcel(cfv(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), cfv(cbs, cfv(c5, cv(hs0)))))
  ffvelrnda(cv(hs0), c7, c5, cmnd, wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c1)))
  adantr(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c1), wf(c5, c7, cmnd))
  prdsbasprj(cv(s0), cv(hs0), c5, c3, c4, c1, c6, c7, c8, wa(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), c7)))
  ad2antrr(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(hs0), c7), wcel(c4, c6))
  ad2antrr(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(hs0), c7), wcel(c7, c8))
  ad2antrr(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(hs0), c7), wfn(c5, c7))
  simplr(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(hs0), c7))
  simpr(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), c7))
  mndrid(cfv(c5, cv(hs0)), cfv(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), cfv(cbs, cfv(c5, cv(hs0))), cfv(cplusg, cfv(c5, cv(hs0))), cfv(c0g, cfv(c5, cv(hs0))))
  eqid(cfv(cplusg, cfv(c5, cv(hs0))))
  prdsplusgval(hs0, cv(s0), c2, c0, c7, c5, c3, c4, c1, c6, c8, wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c1)))
  adantr(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(c0, c1))
  eqeltrd(c0, c1, cmpt(hs0, c7, cfv(c0g, cfv(c5, cv(hs0)))), w0)
  syl5eq(c0, cmpt(hs0, c7, cfv(c0g, cfv(c5, cv(hs0)))), ccom(c0g, c5), w0)
  fmptco(hs0, s0, c0g, c5, c7, cfv(c0g, cfv(c5, cv(hs0))), cfv(c5, cv(hs0)), universe, cfv(c0g, cv(s0)), w0)
  fvexd(c5, cv(hs0), wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c7)))
  feqmptd(hs0, c5, c7, cmnd, w0)
  sylib(w0, wceq(c0g, cmpt(s0, universe, cfv(c0g, cv(s0)))), wfn(c0g, universe))
  a1i(w0, wfn(c0g, universe))
  fn0g()
  dffn5(s0, c0g, universe)
  fveq2(cv(s0), cfv(c5, cv(hs0)), c0g)
  mpbird(w0, wcel(cmpt(hs0, c7, cfv(c0g, cfv(c5, cv(hs0)))), c1), wral(hs0, c7, wcel(cfv(c0g, cfv(c5, cv(hs0))), cfv(cbs, cfv(c5, cv(hs0))))))
  ralrimiva(hs0, c7, w0, wcel(cfv(c0g, cfv(c5, cv(hs0))), cfv(cbs, cfv(c5, cv(hs0)))))
  syl(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c7)), wcel(cfv(c0g, cfv(c5, cv(hs0))), cfv(cbs, cfv(c5, cv(hs0)))), wcel(cfv(c5, cv(hs0)), cmnd))
  ffvelrnda(cv(hs0), c7, c5, cmnd, w0)
  mndidcl(cfv(c5, cv(hs0)), cfv(c0g, cfv(c5, cv(hs0))), cfv(cbs, cfv(c5, cv(hs0))))
  eqid(cfv(cbs, cfv(c5, cv(hs0))))
  eqid(cfv(c0g, cfv(c5, cv(hs0))))
  prdsbasmpt(hs0, c7, cfv(c0g, cfv(c5, cv(hs0))), c1, c5, c3, c4, c6, c8, w0)
  sylib(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c1)), wceq(cv(s0), cmpt(hs0, c7, cfv(cv(s0), cv(hs0)))), wfn(cv(s0), c7))
  prdsbasfn(cv(s0), c7, c3, c4, c5, c1, c6, c8, wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c1)))
  adantr(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(c4, c6))
  adantr(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(c7, c8))
  adantr(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c1), wfn(c5, c7))
  ffnd(c5, c7, cmnd, w0)
  simpr(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c1))
  dffn5(hs0, cv(s0), c7)
  diff.hs0.c(c7)
  diff.hs0.c(universe)
  diff.hs0.c(cfv(c0g, cv(s0)))
  diff.cfv.s(s0, c0g, cfv(c5, cv(hs0)))
  diff.cfv.s(s0, c5, cv(hs0))
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.universe.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.hs0.c(c5)
  diff.c0g.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.c(c4)
  diff.hs0.c(c6)
  diff.hs0.c(c8)
  diff.hs0.w(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c1)))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(cv(s0))
}

thm prdsidlem(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, class c8, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 →(c0 ∈ c1 ∧ ∀(s0 ∈ c1,((c0[c2]s0)= s0 ∧(s0[c2]c0)= s0))))
  ⊣ c3 =(c4[×]c5)
  ⊣ c1 =(Base ` c3)
  ⊣ c2 =(+ ` c3)
  ⊣ (w0 → c4 ∈ c6)
  ⊣ (w0 → c7 ∈ c8)
  ⊣ (w0 →(c5 : c7 → Mnd))
  ⊣ c0 =(0 ∘ c5)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c3)
  ⊣ d(s0, c4)
  ⊣ d(s0, c5)
  ⊣ d(s0, c6)
  ⊣ d(s0, c7)
  ⊣ d(s0, c8)
  ⊣ d(s0, w0)
} = {
  a1ii((w0 →(c0 ∈ c1 ∧ ∀(s0 ∈ c1,((c0[c2]s0)= s0 ∧(s0[c2]c0)= s0)))), d(s0, c1))
  a1ii((w0 →(c0 ∈ c1 ∧ ∀(s0 ∈ c1,((c0[c2]s0)= s0 ∧(s0[c2]c0)= s0)))), d(s0, c2))
  a1ii((w0 →(c0 ∈ c1 ∧ ∀(s0 ∈ c1,((c0[c2]s0)= s0 ∧(s0[c2]c0)= s0)))), d(s0, c3))
  a1ii((w0 →(c0 ∈ c1 ∧ ∀(s0 ∈ c1,((c0[c2]s0)= s0 ∧(s0[c2]c0)= s0)))), d(s0, c4))
  a1ii((w0 →(c0 ∈ c1 ∧ ∀(s0 ∈ c1,((c0[c2]s0)= s0 ∧(s0[c2]c0)= s0)))), d(s0, c6))
  a1ii((w0 →(c0 ∈ c1 ∧ ∀(s0 ∈ c1,((c0[c2]s0)= s0 ∧(s0[c2]c0)= s0)))), d(s0, c7))
  a1ii((w0 →(c0 ∈ c1 ∧ ∀(s0 ∈ c1,((c0[c2]s0)= s0 ∧(s0[c2]c0)= s0)))), d(s0, c8))
  jca(w0, c0 ∈ c1, ∀(s0 ∈ c1,((c0[c2]s0)= s0 ∧(s0[c2]c0)= s0)))
  ralrimiva(s0, c1, w0, ((c0[c2]s0)= s0 ∧(s0[c2]c0)= s0))
  jca((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c1), (c0[c2]s0)= s0, (s0[c2]c0)= s0)
  3eqtr4d((c0[c2]s0), s0, (hs0 ∈ c7 ↦((c0 ` hs0)[(+ `(c5 ` hs0))](s0 ` hs0))), (hs0 ∈ c7 ↦(s0 ` hs0)), (w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c1))
  mpteq2dva(hs0, c7, ((c0 ` hs0)[(+ `(c5 ` hs0))](s0 ` hs0)), (s0 ` hs0), (w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c1))
  eqtrd(((c0 ` hs0)[(+ `(c5 ` hs0))](s0 ` hs0)), (s0 ` hs0), ((0 `(c5 ` hs0))[(+ `(c5 ` hs0))](s0 ` hs0)), ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c1)∧ hs0 ∈ c7))
  oveq1d((c0 ` hs0), (+ `(c5 ` hs0)), (s0 ` hs0), (0 `(c5 ` hs0)), ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c1)∧ hs0 ∈ c7))
  syl2anc(((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c1)∧ hs0 ∈ c7), ((0 `(c5 ` hs0))[(+ `(c5 ` hs0))](s0 ` hs0))=(s0 ` hs0), (c5 ` hs0)∈ Mnd, (s0 ` hs0)∈(Base `(c5 ` hs0)))
  mndlid((c5 ` hs0), (s0 ` hs0), (Base `(c5 ` hs0)), (0 `(c5 ` hs0)), (+ `(c5 ` hs0)))
  prdsplusgval(hs0, c0, c2, s0, c7, c5, c3, c4, c1, c6, c8, (w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c1))
  3eqtr4d((s0[c2]c0), s0, (hs0 ∈ c7 ↦((s0 ` hs0)[(+ `(c5 ` hs0))](c0 ` hs0))), (hs0 ∈ c7 ↦(s0 ` hs0)), (w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c1))
  mpteq2dva(hs0, c7, ((s0 ` hs0)[(+ `(c5 ` hs0))](c0 ` hs0)), (s0 ` hs0), (w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c1))
  eqtrd(((s0 ` hs0)[(+ `(c5 ` hs0))](c0 ` hs0)), (s0 ` hs0), ((s0 ` hs0)[(+ `(c5 ` hs0))](0 `(c5 ` hs0))), ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c1)∧ hs0 ∈ c7))
  oveq2d((s0 ` hs0), (+ `(c5 ` hs0)), (c0 ` hs0), (0 `(c5 ` hs0)), ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c1)∧ hs0 ∈ c7))
  adantlr(w0, s0 ∈ c1, hs0 ∈ c7, (c0 ` hs0)=(0 `(c5 ` hs0)))
  syl5eq((c0 ` hs0), (0 `(c5 ` hs0)), ((0 ∘ c5)` hs0), (w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ c7))
  fveq1i(c0, hs0, (0 ∘ c5))
  sylan(w0, hs0 ∈ c7, ((0 ∘ c5)` hs0)=(0 `(c5 ` hs0)), c5[Fn]c7)
  fvco2(c5, c7, hs0, c0g)
  syl2anc(((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c1)∧ hs0 ∈ c7), ((s0 ` hs0)[(+ `(c5 ` hs0))](0 `(c5 ` hs0)))=(s0 ` hs0), (c5 ` hs0)∈ Mnd, (s0 ` hs0)∈(Base `(c5 ` hs0)))
  ffvelrnda(hs0, c7, c5, cmnd, (w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c1))
  adantr(w0, s0 ∈ c1, (c5 : c7 → Mnd))
  prdsbasprj(s0, hs0, c5, c3, c4, c1, c6, c7, c8, ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c1)∧ hs0 ∈ c7))
  ad2antrr(w0, s0 ∈ c1, hs0 ∈ c7, c4 ∈ c6)
  ad2antrr(w0, s0 ∈ c1, hs0 ∈ c7, c7 ∈ c8)
  ad2antrr(w0, s0 ∈ c1, hs0 ∈ c7, c5[Fn]c7)
  simplr(w0, s0 ∈ c1, hs0 ∈ c7)
  simpr((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c1), hs0 ∈ c7)
  mndrid((c5 ` hs0), (s0 ` hs0), (Base `(c5 ` hs0)), (+ `(c5 ` hs0)), (0 `(c5 ` hs0)))
  eqid((+ `(c5 ` hs0)))
  prdsplusgval(hs0, s0, c2, c0, c7, c5, c3, c4, c1, c6, c8, (w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c1))
  adantr(w0, s0 ∈ c1, c0 ∈ c1)
  eqeltrd(c0, c1, (hs0 ∈ c7 ↦(0 `(c5 ` hs0))), w0)
  syl5eq(c0, (hs0 ∈ c7 ↦(0 `(c5 ` hs0))), (0 ∘ c5), w0)
  fmptco(hs0, s0, c0g, c5, c7, (0 `(c5 ` hs0)), (c5 ` hs0), universe, (0 ` s0), w0)
  fvexd(c5, hs0, (w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ c7))
  feqmptd(hs0, c5, c7, cmnd, w0)
  sylib(w0, 0 =(s0 ∈ 𝕌 ↦(0 ` s0)), 0[Fn]𝕌)
  a1i(w0, 0[Fn]𝕌)
  fn0g()
  dffn5(s0, c0g, universe)
  fveq2(s0, (c5 ` hs0), c0g)
  mpbird(w0, (hs0 ∈ c7 ↦(0 `(c5 ` hs0)))∈ c1, ∀(hs0 ∈ c7,(0 `(c5 ` hs0))∈(Base `(c5 ` hs0))))
  ralrimiva(hs0, c7, w0, (0 `(c5 ` hs0))∈(Base `(c5 ` hs0)))
  syl((w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ c7), (0 `(c5 ` hs0))∈(Base `(c5 ` hs0)), (c5 ` hs0)∈ Mnd)
  ffvelrnda(hs0, c7, c5, cmnd, w0)
  mndidcl((c5 ` hs0), (0 `(c5 ` hs0)), (Base `(c5 ` hs0)))
  eqid((Base `(c5 ` hs0)))
  eqid((0 `(c5 ` hs0)))
  prdsbasmpt(hs0, c7, (0 `(c5 ` hs0)), c1, c5, c3, c4, c6, c8, w0)
  sylib((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c1), s0 =(hs0 ∈ c7 ↦(s0 ` hs0)), s0[Fn]c7)
  prdsbasfn(s0, c7, c3, c4, c5, c1, c6, c8, (w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c1))
  adantr(w0, s0 ∈ c1, c4 ∈ c6)
  adantr(w0, s0 ∈ c1, c7 ∈ c8)
  adantr(w0, s0 ∈ c1, c5[Fn]c7)
  ffnd(c5, c7, cmnd, w0)
  simpr(w0, s0 ∈ c1)
  dffn5(hs0, s0, c7)
  diff.hs0.c(c7)
  diff.hs0.c(universe)
  diff.hs0.c((0 ` s0))
  diff.cfv.s(s0, c0g, (c5 ` hs0))
  diff.cfv.s(s0, c5, hs0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.universe.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.hs0.c(c5)
  diff.c0g.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.c(c4)
  diff.hs0.c(c6)
  diff.hs0.c(c8)
  diff.hs0.w((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c1))

  mpbir2and(wcel(c0, c1), wral(hs1, csn(c0), wa(wceq(co(c0, csn(cop(cop(c0, c0), c0)), cv(hs1)), cv(hs1)), wceq(co(cv(hs1), csn(cop(cop(c0, c0), c0)), c0), cv(hs1)))), wceq(co(c0, csn(cop(cop(c0, c0), c0)), c0), c0), wceq(co(c0, csn(cop(cop(c0, c0), c0)), c0), c0))
  syl5eq(co(c0, csn(cop(cop(c0, c0), c0)), c0), c0, cfv(csn(cop(cop(c0, c0), c0)), cop(c0, c0)), wcel(c0, c1))

blocks.name: mnd1id
blocks.content: The singleton element of a _trivial monoid_ is its identity element. (Contributed by AV, 23-Jan-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm mnd1id(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(cfv(c0g, c2), c0))
  -| wceq(c2, cpr(cop(cfv(cbs, cnx), csn(c0)), cop(cfv(cplusg, cnx), csn(cop(cop(c0, c0), c0)))))
} = {
  eqcomd(cfv(c0g, c2), c0, wcel(c0, c1))
  ismgmid2(hs0, c0, cfv(c0g, c2), csn(c0), c2, csn(cop(cop(c0, c0), c0)), wcel(c0, c1))
  ax-mp(wceq(csn(c0), cfv(cbs, c2)), wcel(csn(c0), universe))
  snex(c0)
  grpbase(csn(c0), universe, c2, csn(cop(cop(c0, c0), c0)))
  eqid(cfv(c0g, c2))
  ax-mp(wceq(csn(cop(cop(c0, c0), c0)), cfv(cplusg, c2)), wcel(csn(cop(cop(c0, c0), c0)), universe))
  snex(cop(cop(c0, c0), c0))
  grpplusg(csn(cop(cop(c0, c0), c0)), universe, c2, csn(c0))
  snidg(c0, c1)
  imp(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(cv(hs0), csn(c0)), wceq(co(c0, csn(cop(cop(c0, c0), c0)), cv(hs0)), cv(hs0)))
  syl5bi(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(cv(hs0), csn(c0)), wceq(co(c0, csn(cop(cop(c0, c0), c0)), cv(hs0)), cv(hs0)), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  syl5ibrcom(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(co(c0, csn(cop(cop(c0, c0), c0)), cv(hs0)), cv(hs0)), wceq(co(c0, csn(cop(cop(c0, c0), c0)), c0), c0))
  eqeq12d(co(c0, csn(cop(cop(c0, c0), c0)), cv(hs0)), cv(hs0), co(c0, csn(cop(cop(c0, c0), c0)), c0), c0, wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  oveq2(cv(hs0), c0, c0, csn(cop(cop(c0, c0), c0)))
  imp(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(cv(hs0), csn(c0)), wceq(co(cv(hs0), csn(cop(cop(c0, c0), c0)), c0), cv(hs0)))
  syl5bi(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(cv(hs0), csn(c0)), wceq(co(cv(hs0), csn(cop(cop(c0, c0), c0)), c0), cv(hs0)), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  velsn(hs0, c0)
  syl5ibrcom(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(co(cv(hs0), csn(cop(cop(c0, c0), c0)), c0), cv(hs0)), wceq(co(c0, csn(cop(cop(c0, c0), c0)), c0), c0))
  syl5eq(co(c0, csn(cop(cop(c0, c0), c0)), c0), c0, cfv(csn(cop(cop(c0, c0), c0)), cop(c0, c0)), wcel(c0, c1))
  df-ov(c0, csn(cop(cop(c0, c0), c0)), c0)
  mpan(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(cfv(csn(cop(cop(c0, c0), c0)), cop(c0, c0)), c0), wcel(cop(c0, c0), universe))
  opex(c0, c0)
  fvsng(cop(c0, c0), universe, c0, c1)
  eqeq12d(co(cv(hs0), csn(cop(cop(c0, c0), c0)), c0), cv(hs0), co(c0, csn(cop(cop(c0, c0), c0)), c0), c0, wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  oveq1(cv(hs0), c0, csn(cop(cop(c0, c0), c0)), c0)
  id(wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(cfv(c0g, c2))
  diff.hs0.c(csn(c0))
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(csn(cop(cop(c0, c0), c0)))
  diff.hs0.w(wcel(c0, c1))
}
